website_summaries.verdict: A budget stroller that lacks any frills or extras but is easy to pack on trips and doesn't take up much space.
pros: At only 7 lbs., it's the lightest of our picks
Small enough to store in the trunk of a car
cons: Handles are short even for small adults

customer_reviews.title: For use at Disney only
customer_reviews.text: Great - For the price. I got for my 4 year old (almost 5) to use at Disney, he is well over 40lbs. My 80lb 8 y/o hopped in a few times as well. Held up for the week. I am 5'4 the height of the stroller was not an issue. Again this is a an umbrella stroller, so not going to handle, feel like the high end stuff, but for my purposed, it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: Like driving a 2001 Mazda with a bad transmission
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few umbrella strollers over my time as mom to 3. This was the cutest and the worst. The umbrella part often got stuck and was hard to fold in, Sometimes it would jam and not fold at all. The wheels are tiny and would barely take a rock or lip in the pavement. I threw this guy away. I do know how to work umbrella strollers btw (I have had a few in my time) Super cute but I would pass because for me use is the most imortant (we travel, go to Disneyland, parks etc.) so our strollers get a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: MMills

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cosco monster umbrella stroller . It has been a great needed addition to my morning and afternoon walks with my little guy . It is a shorter stroller and this is coming from a 5 ft 1 person . My husband can push it pretty easily but has to slunch and reach down to do so . The color is super bright and is such a super cute stroller because of the monster theme . I love the horns and little eye ball on top as well as the bright stripes and additions to it . Definitely worth the amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Angela R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this stroller Nov 20th and at first we thought it was great but wow fell apart quickly. This strollers for an 18 month old and only used in the house, she loves to be pushed around and nap in a stroller. Almost all the wheels don't roll and/or turn correctly. It's a constant struggle. Also, when sitting in the seat the baby leans forward some and is very uncomfortable. If I could figure out how to return I would! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Morin

customer_reviews.title: Great compact, simple, small stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great, compact, small stroller. Use this for short shopping trips where a large jogger stroller would be inconvienient but shopping carts aren’t available. The joggers push much more smoothly for walking/running long distances but can be cumbersome to tote around for quick trips. This one does the trick. The reason for the 4* instead of 5- I wish it had rubber wheels instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: wb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stroller for a trip to Toronto because we didn't have room in the car for our larger stroller. It worked great for our 2 year old! The stroller is very durable and folds up very small. We stored it up on the back window ledge of the car while driving. We took public transit for the 3 days we were in Toronto and this little stroller held up perfectly while walking around the city, getting on and off subways and busses, and walking all around the city. Would definitely recommend this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Cute stroller
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use while camping so we don't have to bring the regular one. I was hesitant to purchase after all the height and wheel comments. I'm not having any of those issues. So far good. My only complaint is that the canopy was bent when it arrived and Amazon nor cosco will send just the replacement canopy. Amazon says I need to return the entire stroller for a replacement. Cosco said I need to call who I purchased it from.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. We like this stroller.
customer_reviews.text: So far I I just love it. It was easy to assemble and it's super cute just like the photo. Much more fun looking than your average umbrella stroller and it has a canopy where as many umbrella strollers don't. It's going to be nice not to have to lug the bigger heavier stroller we have around. It's very bright in person and even cuter in person as well. My 18 month old fit well in it and likes riding in it. Perfect for a quick stroll around the neighborhood and to walk to the nearby park.
customer_reviews.author: ImmortalBeloved

customer_reviews.title: The perfect toy for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my 5 year old daughter as a TOY so she can have her own stroller to push her toys around in while the baby is in our “real” stroller. It’s perfect for her. It’s light and the right height. And of course, the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: alma sanger

customer_reviews.title: bites!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I wouldn't have to carry our heavy-duty stroller on short walks. We have only used it a couple times and the wheels are already very beat up. in addition, both the foot lock to open the stroller and the lap clips have nasty bites. I have gotten bad blood bruises from both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for vacation and expected it to stay there and get thrown away. However, I was very surprised at the quality for the price. We took it on nearly mile long walks and had no issues. It is very lightweight and easy to fold. It doesn’t have storage for bags or drinks but overall we are happy with this. We ended up flying it back home and still use it. I am 6’ tall so it is not quite tall enough for me so it wasn’t the most comfortable to push, it wasn’t a major inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: kindof cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is a stupid yet fun looking stroller,however ,it is a bit cheaply made and even though I knew it didnt lay down,I wish I would have bought one that did.When my grandson fell asleep in it ,he looked so very uncomfortable to the point where I had to tip the stroller back a bit as I walked. For the money spent on it...well that kindof ticked me off because of how cheap it is and Ive seen much better ones for cheaper on social rummage sites. This is what you get though when you are impatient
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: It's a great spare stroller that can be kept in the car ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so cute and very light weight. It's a great spare stroller that can be kept in the car so that the bigger one doesn't need to be packed every time you leave the house. It's not a jogging stroller or one for long walks, but it you need a spare for shopping, zoos, parks etc, this one will fit the bill and you don't have to bother with that big, fancy, smooth riding stroller for these activities. We get comments about how cute it is every time we bring it out!!
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Decent if you’re a shorter person
customer_reviews.text: This stroller works great for me but my husband and mother in law have issues pushing it because they’re taller (5’11 and 5’8) i’m short(4’11) so it doesn’t bother me but it hurts their backs to push it for too long. The other issues with this stroller is the wheels, they get turned sideways all the time and if your walking at a decent speed it kind of flips forward a little bit. The stroller itself is good quality, the fabric is durable and it folds up easily. The umbrella on the top is just for show though, it not big enough to actually protect from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trip
customer_reviews.text: went to Disneyland and at last minute decided we should have an additional stroller. We also took a graco stroller. We were planning to use the Graco for the 3 year old but then thought the 5 year old might get tired. So we shipped this Cosco stroller to our hotel. It was perfect for the 3 year old and we were very glad to have 2 strollers for whenever both kids got tired. Walked 8 miles a day even with an on location hotel nap every day. The adults were looking for their own stroller. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great! Sturdy, lightweight, easy to set up/put away, and my kid loves riding his monster stroller. As others have said, this is a tiny, tiny stroller. It almost looks like it made for dolls. I am 4'9 and the handles hit just above my waist. This is actually a huge plus for me because I find it much easier to maneuver than bigger strollers. However, if you are much taller then that I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and well packaged. Love the vibrant colors. Almost fully assembled, easy to open and close. Super adorable. Consider the top only can be open/close, wont be able to stretched forward in case the sun in front facing.
customer_reviews.author: Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Fun Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I got this to push my little niece around in. It's lightweight and she is comfortable enough to fall asleep in it. It seems to do well over most terrain although I probably wouldn't take it on a hiking trail or anything crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Lunabug

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old granddaughter loves riding in the stroller. I don’t think she cares one way or the other about Elliot the monster. She just enjoys being outside and going for rides. I firmly believe we got our moneys worth. The front wheels don’t always like to cooperate but since this is for use at Nana and Papa’s house it definitely was worth what I paid for it. All in all, this Nana won’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: AwDrat

customer_reviews.title: Meets the needs for quick errands!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is super cute! It folds up nicely but feels flimsy at times and if not careful can get pinched. The visor that attaches is hard to get on and off. When the stroller is unfolded and being used, the handles don't reach as high to push comfortably and it makes it uncomfortable to walk slouched over. I wish I could find a more durable one for the same price and one that's universal for both genders.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Crumbley

customer_reviews.title: Super light and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was amazing and extremely cute. I say "was" amazing because after our vacation, I sold it for half price to an employee at the hotel we were staying at. She fell in love with it, but it would be hard for her to order it from her country. I will be buying again for our next vacation. Hopefully, it will return with us.
customer_reviews.author: BossLady

customer_reviews.title: Great product. A testament to how well it rolls
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that with such an inexpensive product there might be issues. The casters are very durable and roll well. Great product. A testament to how well it rolls, the older sister likes to push little sister around in it, and can do so without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Habib Jamar Rafiki

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and very functional
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and very functional! This stroller folds up very small and easily. I keep it in the trunk of my car at all times for convenience! * The only thing I would ask for is over the shoulder straps. This stroller only buckles around the waist, so please make sure your child is ready for that stage of stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Ehh there are better options.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a fine stroller just super uncomfortable my son looks like a garlic knot when he tries to lay back and when he falls asleep we have to tilt the stroller up on its back wheels so he can be somewhat reclined. We found a stroller we had forgotten about that was gifted to us at his baby shower which is lightweight, reclreclined, is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anaiah Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a 6' male, don't buy it. You'll spend your time pushing this thing all hunched over because the little handles are so close to the ground. My son likes to ride in it. That's about the only good thing. The wheels work great on pavement, and that's it. We took this to the mall over the weekend, and the hard plastic wheels just slid along the floor on all surfaces (carpet, hardwood, tile) making pushing this thing nothing but frustrating. Seriously, just skip this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very low/short handles
customer_reviews.text: The actual stroller function is great folds easy quick assembly that was super easy it’s cute and it handles well. I am 5’6” and this stroller is extremely short! The handles are so low that I hunch when I walk with this and it hurts my back. We bought as a cheap stroller to use at Disney land instead of our expensive one and won’t be using this due to its shortness
customer_reviews.author: Krissee

customer_reviews.title: Very cute stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute stroller! We bought this for our last vacation, as our son is almost three and usually walks most places. But with all the sightseeing we planned on doing, we knew it was either get an umbrella stroller, or plan to carry him a lot! This was the perfect thing to have, as it folds down and doesn't take up much room in the car. My son loves riding in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight handy & just too cute
customer_reviews.text: Oh it’s too cute, cuter in person than in pictures! I’m a disabled grandma and this stroller is perfect for me to b able to use and close up and carry up my stairs without struggling or hurting my Messed up back that makes me disabled. Absolutely love everything about this stroller
customer_reviews.author: rachel bates

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for your baby
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stroller for the summer ! Not only is the stroller cute (I've received so many compliments) but it's lightweight, easy to clean (just wipe it down) and very convenient for summer trips to the beach,quick trips to the grocery store etc. If you ride public transportation like me, you need something you can fold in a breeze and something that won't take up lots of space. It does not recline so it is best suitable for babies with neck control. It is not good for nap time
customer_reviews.author: Ri Tee

customer_reviews.title: Cute.com
customer_reviews.text: I’m visiting my girlfriend in Virginia from California and just brought her carrier instead of her travel system. My daughter gained some lbs hurting my back and I wanted a light weight stroller just to use for the time we’re here. Saw this and feel in love with how cute it is! Colors pop and it’s an eye catcher. Came on time kinda frustrating to put the monster cover on I couldn’t get it but worth having it on there my baby looks and feels like a cool little big girl
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ward-Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Cheapy but great price
customer_reviews.text: Really kinda cheapy feeling, not very good maneuverability. BUT it is so inexpensive that I hesitate to give it a bad review. If you're looking for a super cheap stroller this is bright and cute and works. I ended up returning it and getting a slightly more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if your toddler has a tendency to lean forward when they see anything that catches their eye, they will promptly topple over, the seatbelt only goes over their waist, not over the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Shu Chin Ma

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute and my daughter loves it. Idk if ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and my daughter loves it. Idk if this is a thing specific to this stroller or all strollers.... but it’s too short for me. I’m 5’7” and I have to bend/slouch when using it. Not something you really think about until you are walking with it for a while and your back is tired from not walking with your back straight.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to fold.. terrible to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s light and fold up. I can’t use it as the handles are too short so I’m hunch over, kicking the bottom or wheels, and it can’t handle any terrain except maybe a basketball court. I seriously hate it. Great for parents shorter than 5’ that love to walk around basketball courts!
customer_reviews.author: Yeezy

customer_reviews.title: Not really a stroller; cheap wheels don’t turn
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but front wheels drag in lieu of turning. Tried to return but wasn’t given the option to drop off at Marshall’s and no longer have the box. Cute but poor construction. Recommend spending $20 more and getting a decent stroller that has wheels that work
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is super fun. The colors. The design. It's great for my 11 month old. It's compact and easy to pop up. I just toss it in the car and if I need to take it out it's light weight but surdy. The straps are great as in they are not easy to tighten or loosen. I don't want my child playing with the buckles (which we all know our kids find interesting) and then slip out of it. The locks work great and it's a great material for a hot summer day. All in all- good quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not going to change your life, but probably won’t ruin it either.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. We bought this for a last minute trip after realizing we didn’t have enough room to pack our larger strollers. It worked great for what it is- a quick and dirty umbrella stroller. Add points for being adorable, subtract points for the wheels being kind of annoying on anything but asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Schneider

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: We needed an umbrella stroller for vacation for my 3 yro and wanted to get something cheap. This product definitely is on the inexpensive side, and if you are looking for a quick solution for a short time period, this might be the choice for you. But, the stroller is definitely not on the comfortable side: my daughter didn't find it comfortable to sit in, and for the adult pushing the stroller, it was hard on your back and your hand due to the position of the stroller handle. The wheels keep turning and were especially challenging on rougher surface or bumps. I wouldn't recommend it if you plan to use it for more than one month.
customer_reviews.author: Ye

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I actually got this for our 5 year old daughter as a doll baby stroller because the toy ones are so cheaply made and break easily. She loves it and it is not too large for our small house. It's just the right height for her compared to the toy ones which are way to short!She hasn't stopped playing with it and her Baby Alive with car seat since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Stup

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to steer
customer_reviews.text: Handles could be a little longer for back comfort of pusher. Difficult to steer on rocky or grassy terrains
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fold able simple stroller.
customer_reviews.text: This is the typical fold-able stroller, wheels were a little janky after a few uses, but nothing making it useless. It was also the cutest thing people have seen! Worth the buy still to stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydoo

customer_reviews.title: It's a great and cute stroller for light errand running days
customer_reviews.text: It's a great and cute stroller for light errand running days. I'm 5'3 and it's prefect for my to push around but not for my boyfriend who's 6'4. He can just carry her in the stroller lol. It's pretty durable for the price and I just love the colors. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jade Givner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst umbrella stroller we’ve ever owned. The wheels don’t move easily and constantly get stuck. Wheels are too small and made of terrible plastic. The stroller is also extremely short - even when in use by a 5 foot 1 inch person - you have to hunch to push it. The only positive is that the design is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmine

customer_reviews.title: fell apart after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: i wanted to like it so much! it’s so cute and different. got it for our trip to jamaica. lasted in airport Going there, then the FIRST day we used it, it broke. one of the bars underneath gave out. as if an adult sat in it is best way to explain. we had to toss it. our son is 30 lbs. i was so sad it didn’t last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mannellino

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to stear or fold up
customer_reviews.text: Got this stroller for a vacation. It sure is cute but that’s the only good thing about it. It’s not so easy to fold - it gave me a really hard time in the security line at the airport. Also, the wheels get stuck on the smallest bump or pebble. Total Headache at the zoo - I had to keep asking my son to get out any time we came across gravel. I’ve had better umbrella strollers.
customer_reviews.author: KeNa

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall people!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute this is... BUT- I'm 5'11 and my husband is 6'4. This is terrible for us!!! It's too short, so we both have to bend/slouch over to push it. Fine for short jaunts, but not for any length of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Texan in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 ft 2 in and this was a little too short for me. The canopy is a joke. It doesn't shade my baby at all. I'm very disappointed in this!
customer_reviews.author: Melody316

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella stroller for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella stroller for the price. Obviously it's not adequate for miles of infant transporting, but it's great for outings and short walks. The monster roof that provides shade from the sun is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne2727881

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and practical for our needs. Keeping it at our summer home so we didn't have to carry our other umbrella stroller back and forth. Wish the arms would extend for when my husband, who is much taller, is pushing it. He has to hunch over a bit. Also which an under carriage basket was included for storage, but I purchased one that hooks on arms which is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann2681

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to push
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little stroller and folds up to be tiny so it's great if you have a small car. The handles are too low for tall people and very uncomfortable to push the baby in this. It works, but it isn't a great product.
customer_reviews.author: amudhan

customer_reviews.title: Super lite and looks really cool
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for travel and so far it has survived 2 trips by Plane - gate check in. as well as a couple of random day trips where space was a premium in the trunk to put a full size stroller in. Super lite and looks really cool :).
customer_reviews.author: Cmrz

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 month old specifically for traveling through the airport. Worked perfect! Light weight, pretty easy to maneuver with one hand and easy to collapse. Was able to take this right up to the plane. Was a life saver for traveling. My daughter likes the bright colors of the monster and it’s easily visible. Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Baby be chill in his ride
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what I needed it for. We have two strollers: one for off-roading, and the other one for Urban travel. This is the stroller for urban travel, and the baby likes him more then the other stroller. He seems so much more relaxed, and happier to see the world around him.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: the tires are really cheap and do not roll too well. there is no bag in the back to store stuff like other strollers of similar price. the canopy does not pivot down to adjust to sun angle. If I could I would return this. a cheapy stroller from babies are us is better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Pena

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, turns very easily. Fits my son whose 1yr and half. Technically, my 4 yr old daughter could fit it but it's not labeled for use with children of that age. Pretty good little stroller for the price
customer_reviews.author: *Apryl Ramirez*

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for short people?
customer_reviews.text: We have to hunch way over to grab the handles, which makes it pretty uncomfortable to use. Also, the front wheels don't turn very well. If they get turned, you really have to fight it go make them go straight again. Folding and unfolding is very easy, and it's super cute. Unfortunately the short height is a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lars SveenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not practical.
customer_reviews.text: Being 5'10-1/2, this stroller makes me have to bend too much. It's shorter than most. Also, the sunviser is cute, but not practical. Doesn't cover her face in the sun. Also, the wheels tend to do what they want, causing the steering to be a challenge at times.
customer_reviews.author: KCLUVSDOLFNS

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, just the front wheels and the canopy needed to be attached. It is super cute and light weight; great for travel. I bought it for when my grandson visits which is soon, so I haven't tried it yet; it is a bit short but should be okay for me, I'm 5'7", but my 6' husband might not like it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: This fold up umbrella stroller is stored in the trunk of my car so that it's always available for when it's needed. It's lightweight, easy to open and push, and my little one loves riding around in it. I love the cuteness of it with the monster decoration. Very pleased with this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very small seat
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift and saw for first time today. It’s cute but the seat is VERY small, almost too small for the 23 month-old toddler. It’s really cute but I think overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Cute basic stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is really cute with the monster theme. The "canopy", though, is pretty much for decoration only, as it doesn't come down far enough to keep rain or sun off the baby.
customer_reviews.author: April Porter

customer_reviews.title: This held up to 2 1/2 months of international travel ...
customer_reviews.text: This held up to 2 1/2 months of international travel with a toddler. I am impressed! Two things is that the handles are a bit low and rough on the hands. Wish it was taller so I didn’t have to bend while pushing. I’m only 5’5”. And the sun covering keeps popping off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L Ibey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling!! Its nice and sturdy! Im 5'1 so its perfect height for me was a little short for my 6 foot husband but he said it wasnt terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So cute, fun and my kid loves it. I miss the compartment under from a regular stroller but you get what you’re looking for! Light weight foldable and cute stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Mamanna

customer_reviews.title: Car Travel Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travel! It was used for running to the restroom on the road and to feed him (9 months) in at rest stops. It is a little short for pushing long distances. I am 5'5" and I have to bend to push it! The wheel locks are great and it folds up easily for quick access! I drive a tiny car and it fits nicely in the back end or in the front seat. Very light weight! The sun cover is great too!
customer_reviews.author: D Dunn

customer_reviews.title: It works for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. It’s a little short and I have to hunch over to push it. It doesn’t maneuver too good. It does what it’s supposrd to do though and takes up very little room and it’s cheap, that’s the whole point. So I can’t be too hard on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Finney

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price hut the wheels often get stuck sideways or don't roll over certain surfaces. The fabric is cheap, after just a few uses, a hole has formed at the bottom of the seat where it covers the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not for the long run.
customer_reviews.text: This is a one vacation stroller at best. During my vacation when I needed it the most, the front left wheel kept on locking in one side constantly even after I changed direction to point to the front. The aluminum bends easily. My kid was 24 lbs and seeing how it's crooked won't last another use of pushing another week. I only used this product 3 weeks in total.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang V.

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BUT NOT STRONG
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH, UNFORTUNATELY IT DIDNT LAST 2 DAYS. I WASTED MY MONEY. I REGRET BUYING THIS PRODUCT AND WOULDNT ENCOURAGE ANYONE TO BUY IT. ITS MADE FOR DOLLS.
customer_reviews.author: khadina modeste

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr. old daughter bought with her allowance for her "baby dolls". It is sooo cute. It is VERY sturdy as she actually had her 9 yr. old cousin in it strolling him around as well. I made her stop......however, it did hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Reunification

customer_reviews.title: It feels a bit flimsy but is extremely easy to fold and strap the child in
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to take on vacation so we would not have to lug around our bigger stroller. It feels a bit flimsy but is extremely easy to fold and strap the child in. The canopy seems kind of useless but it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great to use to get in and out with baby.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice stroller to use to take my 9 month old in and out somewhere quick without lugging a heavy stroller or carrying him. I wish it had a 5 point clip because he gets restless and wants out and tries to stretch his body so he can. The wheels get stuck and it's hard to fold quickly. But it's cute and fits great in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the most adorable affordable stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter to use with her doll, however she keeps putting her 2 year old brother in it. We know it's a real stroller!!! lol! It's so cute !! very vibrant!!! Looks better in person
customer_reviews.author: inika buie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. The packaging was fine, but the strollers plastic handles were damaged and wheels were missing. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: krissyd

customer_reviews.title: When I got it I was looking for a cheap stroller to keep in my car since my sister never leaves me his so the pricing was perfec
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old nephew loooooves it, so much so he prefers this stroller to his fancy pants stroller his mom and dad use. When I got it I was looking for a cheap stroller to keep in my car since my sister never leaves me his so the pricing was perfect. I thought it would be poor quality but its actually sturdy and well made. Like I said, my nephew loves it so I guess it gets the seal of approval.
customer_reviews.author: MG16

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's so cute and different from the other Strollers in the store. The only downside for me, is I'm taller, so I feel like I have to hunch over a bit to push it. But I don't use it for long times. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for heavier kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is not a lightweight and this stroller was more of a hassle then helpful most times. The front wheels spin around sideways when you stop and you literally have to straighten with your hands (or feet because I ended up kicking them) before you could move again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great, wheels aren't hard at all, people probably just hating! I love mine, ordered it to have more space on my truck and took it to six flags all day, my boy was comfortable and had an ok size head shade cover. Itll be Awesome if it had a cup holder for the kids sippy cup or bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: SO fun! Easy for my little guy to climb in ...
customer_reviews.text: SO fun! Easy for my little guy to climb in and out of and cute! The only thing I would change is the handle height...I am 5'8' and sometimes I feel like I have to lean over a bit when pushing. My husband is a little taller, and he hates pushing this stroller because he does have to lean over too much.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my daughter for her dolls
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old still enjoys pushing baby dolls in a stroller - baby doll strollers do not work as she is too tall. This was perfect. It is cute and fun
customer_reviews.author: Renee M. Olejnik

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good stroller All Things Considered. However when I got it it was a bit meaning we used and there were a few threads but it was still great exactly worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Vadim K.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Easy to manuever
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Easy to manuever. Took it on our trip to Disney. 5 year old Grandson loved it. Canopy over head provided shade while out during the August heat. Easy to lock and store. Recommend it. Great price also
customer_reviews.author: PKittrell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute stroller however I don’t know how ang one could use it. I could not tighten the straps to buckle my daughter in which is so dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but short
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price and super cute. 3 stars just because you have to be super short to use it comfortably, I'm only 5'4 and it's kind of awkward for me to push and for my husband who is like 5'9 it's pretty uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rheanne G

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy, and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and we had several people comment on it already. The delivery driver left it sitting out in pouring rain, so when we got it opened water came pouring out of it. We let it air dry in the bathtub and it’s fine. (Thankfully). Based on that I’d say it’s pretty durable!
customer_reviews.author: TigerKitty

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest fold and unfold. Everything else is good. Lightweight and easy to make turns. My 3 year old had no complaints about comfort so that's probably great too.
customer_reviews.author: Canielle

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents of toddlers; save your back and enjoy a secure walk with your grandchild.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for us to use with our younger grandchildren. It stays in the back of our SUV and comes in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great little stroller for such a cheap price! It’s absolutely adorable and my baby appears to be very comfortable in it. She loves the freedom of not having anything in front of her and waves her little arms forward and excitedly squeals!
customer_reviews.author: heidileiva

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the cutest thing ever! Bought for my niece so when she goes with us it's more lightweight than her car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for visiting The Mouse!!
customer_reviews.text: Were in need of strollers for the happiest place on Earth. Rental quotes were ridiculous. Ordered a few days before our trip, free shipping to our WDW hotel & they held our package until our arrival. Lightweight, cheap alternative & super easy to use. Obnoxious colors/design make them stand out in “stroller parking.” Best deal ever!
customer_reviews.author: K P King

customer_reviews.title: Light Stroller
customer_reviews.text: The stroller looks great. My kid loves this. It's easy to fold and with light weight. The only problem will be it is difficult to turn around because the wheels are not good enough. But can be acceptable considering the price. I will use them for travel purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: The stroller was a little bit difficult to work with ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller was a little bit difficult to work with because the handles are so low. It’s not a very smooth ride and the wheels seem to get stuck in the wrong position frequently, but it served its purpose of being a light stroller and we were able to travel around Tokyo with an emergency stroller for my five-year-old when he got tired of walking and he was jetlahged.
customer_reviews.author: Samia Naseem

customer_reviews.title: Buckle broke with very minimal use
customer_reviews.text: We loved this stroller- it was perfect for what we needed, but the buckle snapped in half after we had it about two weeks so now it’s useless, as our baby isn’t old enough to ride in it without being strapped in. We tried to fix it with spare parts we ordered off amazon but were unsuccessful and now it is too late to return it. I would just spend a little extra to get one that won’t break.
customer_reviews.author: JCV

customer_reviews.title: The wheels on the front have also started to stick and don't turn as easily. If it wasn't for how awesome I think ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than the umbrella strollers they use to sell at toys'R'us. The wheels on the front have also started to stick and don't turn as easily. If it wasn't for how awesome I think it looks I would put it at a 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Klozof

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my my then 2yr old. It was very easy to fold and unfold. No issues the wheels were always straight when in use(didnt turn or wobble) when being pushed or turned will but again.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Minott

customer_reviews.title: Its a good stroller and compact
customer_reviews.text: Its a good stroller and compact. Only complaint is the handles are too short and im only 5'8". I have a hard time pushing it in comfort because k have to bend over to reach the handles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: first time buying this for My 3 years old son 。 good quality !Light and convenient, but I bought two sons and daughters together. This pink is used for two weeks. The front two wheels are stiff and don't work. It is a burden to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: fiona chen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the airport , couldn’t beat the price for a travel stroller . Not comfortable for long adventures but great for quick trips . The color and design are super cute . My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves riding in this stroller. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves riding in this stroller. It is very light weight. Doesn't take up much space closed or open. My son loves the sun shade, but it really isn't functional. It is just too small to keep sun off him unless it is behind the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Eicholtz

customer_reviews.title: The stroller was very flimsy. The front wheels got ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller was very flimsy. The front wheels got caught on every bump on sidewalk. The handles were too short and I'm only 5'2. Hard to walk behind the stroller when pushing it, as the handles were so short.
customer_reviews.author: BG

product_meta.title: Cosco Umbrella Stroller (Monster Elliot)
product_meta.description: Color:Red MultiMake every walk fun and wild with the colorful Cosco Monster Elliot Umbrella Stroller. Your child will love riding along in this fun, monster-themed stroller. This stroller features a simple umbrella fold that's compact and stores easily in a closet or car. A double foot brake provides extra safety on inclined surfaces or when moving the child into or out of the stroller. Designed for travel, this fun stroller is lightweight and easy to carry. The stroller's three-point safety harness keeps children up to 40 pounds safe and secure, plus a built-in leg rest keeps little feet comfortable. This stroller is JPMA-certified, meets ASTM standards for safety, and includes a one-year limited warranty. For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading children’s product brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value. From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design.
feature_bullets: Your child will love riding along in this fun, monster themed Cosco stroller

A double foot brake provides extra safety on inclined surfaces or when moving the child into or out of the stroller
Designed for travel, this fun stroller is lightweight and easy to carry
The 3 point safety harness keeps children upto 40 pounds safe and secure, plus a built in leg rest keeps little feet comfortable
This stroller is JPMA certified, meets astm standards for safety, and includes a 1 year limited warranty
